items.sentence: Tom thanked me for helping him decorate his house.
Tom sometimes got teased for being slow at school.
Tom showed Mary the letter he got from his father.
Tom has been asking us a lot of strange questions.
I asked Tom to explain to me what his problem was.
I still don't understand why Tom hates me so much.
I did everything I could do, but it wasn't enough.
Are you sure that you don't need to buy more food?
Jupiter is the largest planet in the Solar System.
This is the most beautiful ostrich I've ever seen.
